channel.title: A simple problem if someone could help
channel.description: I'm not that big of a noob but i was woundering if anyone could help me create a msn bot that could talk to people. Sort of like spleak(spleak@hotmail.com). My reason for doing this is i think it would be a great learning expiriance. Well repost if you want to join me for this project.

item.title: A simple problem if someone could help
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“robbee, post:4, topic:82997”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=121933.msg1198462#msg1198462 date=1177262860]

I’m not that big of a noob but i was woundering if anyone could help me create a msn bot that could talk to people. Sort of like spleak(spleak@hotmail.com). My reason for doing this is i think it would be a great learning expiriance. Well repost if you want to join me for this project.

okey, so i will studie more of the code of SCAR and if it dosent work out with SCAR then how would i get the program that spleak or smarter child uses

I’ll keep it in scripting help for a few obvious reasons.

Lets start, bots like spleak and smarterchild don’t use programs like SCAR, they use modified clients or programs that can get text from the windows even when covered, then a reply is made. Something similar is done with IRC responders, gets the text from the program and replys(if possible).

However, when making one in SCAR, you need to consider the:
Font
Font size
Font color
How to get the text

You also need to think out the following:
Am I doing this the best possible way?
What other ways could I do this?

I thought of something while posting this, if you double click the line space when someone messages you, it selects it all if it’s on one line.
[/quote][/quote]

Careful robbee. I got warned for doing that by freddy1990 because he thought it was spam. Your message was inside the quote which was “okey, so i will studie more of the code of SCAR and if it dosent work out with SCAR then how would i get the program that spleak or smarter child uses”. You might want to edit your post because i don’t want you to get warned.

And yes it was be quite hard and i am not that good of a scripter to do so. Sorry for not doing it.

Read full topic
item.source: A simple problem if someone could help

I’m not that big of a noob but i was woundering if anyone could help me create a msn bot that could talk to people. Sort of like spleak(spleak@hotmail.com). My reason for doing this is i think it would be a great learning expiriance. Well repost if you want to join me for this project.
[/quote]
okey, so i will studie more of the code of SCAR and if it dosent work out with SCAR then how would i get the program that spleak or smarter child uses

I’ll keep it in scripting help for a few obvious reasons.

Lets start, bots like spleak and smarterchild don’t use programs like SCAR, they use modified clients or programs that can get text from the windows even when covered, then a reply is made. Something similar is done with IRC responders, gets the text from the program and replys(if possible).

However, when making one in SCAR, you need to consider the:
Font
Font size
Font color
How to get the text

You also need to think out the following:
Am I doing this the best possible way?
What other ways could I do this?

I thought of something while posting this, if you double click the line space when someone messages you, it selects it all if it’s on one line.[/quote]

item.title: A simple problem if someone could help
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

robbee:

I’m not that big of a noob but i was woundering if anyone could help me create a msn bot that could talk to people. Sort of like spleak(spleak@hotmail.com). My reason for doing this is i think it would be a great learning expiriance. Well repost if you want to join me for this project.

I’ll keep it in scripting help for a few obvious reasons.

Lets start, bots like spleak and smarterchild don’t use programs like SCAR, they use modified clients or programs that can get text from the windows even when covered, then a reply is made. Something similar is done with IRC responders, gets the text from the program and replys(if possible).

However, when making one in SCAR, you need to consider the:
Font
Font size
Font color
How to get the text

You also need to think out the following:
Am I doing this the best possible way?
What other ways could I do this?

I thought of something while posting this, if you double click the line space when someone messages you, it selects it all if it’s on one line.
